install.name: htmlfix
install.author: Martin Larsen
install.description: Put htmlfix around html code in wysiwyg editors and you will get the expected result. Eg. {htmlfix}<h1>Hi</h1>{/htmlfix}. You can also use "safety mode": {htmlfix:}<:h1>Hi<:/h1>{/htmlfix}

param.name: allow_script
param.label: Allow javascript
param.description: Select No if you want javascript to be stripped between htmlfix tags for security reasons
